The building will house key ministries and aims to improve efficiency, save taxpayer money, and provide modern amenities. Modi emphasized that policies for a developed India will be framed in these Kartavya Bhavans.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kartavya-bhawan-pm-modi-explains-reason-behind-name-of-indias-new-power-corridor/articleshow/123144585.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kartavya-bhawan-pm-modi-explains-reason-behind-name-of-indias-new-power-corridor/articleshow/123144585.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:51:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49414" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123144601,imgsize-49414.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is Edward Coristine? The incident unexpectedly united Donald Trump and Elon Musk, who both voiced support for Coristine and criticized D.C.'s crime rates. This rare alignment between the two influential figures has reignited discussions about public safety and Coristine's profile as a public figure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/who-is-edward-coristine-former-doge-hire-big-balls-attacked-while-saving-women-in-us-capital-praised-by-donald-trump-and-elon-musk/articleshow/123141194.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/who-is-edward-coristine-former-doge-hire-big-balls-attacked-while-saving-women-in-us-capital-praised-by-donald-trump-and-elon-musk/articleshow/123141194.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 17:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20626" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141261,imgsize-20626.cms"/></item><item><title>50% US duty on India: Trump threatens more tariff; leaves door open for talks</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump has announced a 25% tariff on India due to its continued purchase of Russian crude oil, despite prior warnings. Ajit Doval is in Moscow for talks on strategic partnership. It includes images and GIFs for the festival. The content focuses on expressing love and strengthening sibling relationships. Fake certificate names US prez as Samastipur local</title><description><![CDATA[A bizarre incident in Bihar's Samastipur district has emerged during the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls, where an online application was filed claiming US President Donald Trump as a resident. The application included Trump's photo and his parents' names. Authorities rejected it and filed an FIR.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/diabolical-attempt-to-impact-sir-fake-certificate-names-donald-trump-a-bihar-local-fir-lodged/articleshow/123142884.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/diabolical-attempt-to-impact-sir-fake-certificate-names-donald-trump-a-bihar-local-fir-lodged/articleshow/123142884.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:00:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="699770" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143441,imgsize-699770.cms"/></item><item><title>'India contributes more than US': RBI guv on Trump's 'dead economy' jab</title><description><![CDATA[RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra refuted Donald Trump's 'dead economy' remark, asserting India's strong economic performance and significant contribution to global growth, exceeding that of the United States. His performance offers India confidence in his potential for Test matches, particularly in SENA countries, despite likely limited opportunities at home.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/exclusive-prasidh-krishnas-coach-he-played-into-englands-hands-initially-pulled-off-a-3-card-trick-later/articleshow/123143380.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/exclusive-prasidh-krishnas-coach-he-played-into-englands-hands-initially-pulled-off-a-3-card-trick-later/articleshow/123143380.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 18:59:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARNAB MUKHERJI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143395,imgsize-33966.cms"/></item><item><title>Will 'Paatal Lok' star Jaideep Ahlawat play cricketer Nitish Rana in his biopic?</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricketer Nitish Rana expressed his desire for Jaideep Ahlawat to portray him in a biopic, citing their shared Jaat heritage and Ahlawat's Haryanvi speaking ability. Here's how to prevent kidney stone risk</title><description><![CDATA[Beets, a nutritional powerhouse, offer numerous health benefits but concern kidney stone sufferers due to their high oxalate content. Experts suggest boiling or fermenting beets to reduce oxalate levels significantly. Pairing them with calcium-rich foods like yogurt aids oxalate binding in the gut, preventing kidney stone formation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/love-beets-but-worried-about-kidney-health-heres-how-you-can-reduce-oxalates-and-prevent-kidney-stone-risk/articleshow/123144747.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/love-beets-but-worried-about-kidney-health-heres-how-you-can-reduce-oxalates-and-prevent-kidney-stone-risk/articleshow/123144747.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 20:02:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="95170" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123144764,imgsize-95170.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand floods: 11 Army jawans missing; rescue ops underway</title><description><![CDATA[A cloudburst near Harsil in Uttarakhand's Uttarkashi district triggered a flash flood, leaving 11 Indian Army jawans missing. Rescue teams, including the NDRF and Army personnel, are working tirelessly in challenging conditions to locate the missing soldiers. The area is isolated due to road breaches and a collapsed bridge, complicating relief efforts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-11-army-jawans-missing-confirms-ndrf-rescue-ops-underway/articleshow/123141746.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-11-army-jawans-missing-confirms-ndrf-rescue-ops-underway/articleshow/123141746.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:59:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1623966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123142191,imgsize-1623966.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: School ditches 'backbencher' setup; inspired by Malayalam film</title><description><![CDATA[Govt. High School, Dongargaon in Burhanpur district, Madhya Pradesh, has pioneered a 'U-shape' seating arrangement, inspired by Kerala, to eliminate the concept of 'backbenchers.' Principal Jagdish Patil's initiative fosters dialogue, inclusivity, and leadership by positioning students face-to-face with the teacher. Following its success in Class 10, Class 9 students requested the same arrangement, drawing interest from other district schools.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/watch-madhya-pradesh-school-ditches-backbencher-setup-with-u-shaped-seating-plan-inspired-by-malayalam-film-sthaanarthi-shreekuttan/articleshow/123143039.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/watch-madhya-pradesh-school-ditches-backbencher-setup-with-u-shaped-seating-plan-inspired-by-malayalam-film-sthaanarthi-shreekuttan/articleshow/123143039.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 18:56:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LITHA ACHARI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88058" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143987,imgsize-88058.cms"/></item><item><title>'Poo bani Parwati': Anaya Bangar wears mom's saree, recreates iconic Kareena Kapoor moment from K3G</title><description><![CDATA[Anaya Bangar, daughter of former Indian cricketer Sanjay Bangar, recently shared photos on Instagram dressed in a saree, referencing Kareena Kapoor's iconic 'Poo bani Parwati' look. Despite past incidents causing significant damage to homes and livelihoods, no lives were lost between 2010 and 2018.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-flash-flood-dharali-mountain-village-that-marks-calendar-by-number-of-times-it-sinks-river-arrives-unannounced-and-dragging-centuries-of-stone/articleshow/123130541.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-flash-flood-dharali-mountain-village-that-marks-calendar-by-number-of-times-it-sinks-river-arrives-unannounced-and-dragging-centuries-of-stone/articleshow/123130541.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 07:06:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KAUTILYA SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45354" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123130779,imgsize-45354.cms"/></item><item><title>Top 5 entertainment news: Fans react to Priyanka Chopra's cryptic post about 'disrespect'</title><description><![CDATA[Priyanka Chopra's cryptic post about 'disrespect' ignited fan speculation. Mukesh Khanna defended Shah Rukh Khan's National Award win, emphasizing his deserving dedication to cinema.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/top-5-entertainment-news-fans-react-to-priyanka-chopras-cryptic-post-about-disrespect-mukesh-khanna-defends-shah-rukh-khans-national-award-win/articleshow/123143180.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/top-5-entertainment-news-fans-react-to-priyanka-chopras-cryptic-post-about-disrespect-mukesh-khanna-defends-shah-rukh-khans-national-award-win/articleshow/123143180.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143180,imgsize-56658.cms"/></item><item><title>'That mentality ... ': Sacked by BCCI, ex-India coach finally breaks silence on KKR return</title><description><![CDATA[Abhishek Nayar, after his departure from the Indian cricket team's coaching staff, has rejoined Kolkata Knight Riders as a mentor in the IPL. He's also taken on a mentorship role with the UP Warriorz in the WPL, aiming to cultivate a winning culture. Nayar highlighted the significant progress in women's cricket, noting the increased power and athleticism in the game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/that-mentality-sacked-by-bcci-ex-india-coach-finally-breaks-silence-on-kkr-return/articleshow/123139658.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/that-mentality-sacked-by-bcci-ex-india-coach-finally-breaks-silence-on-kkr-return/articleshow/123139658.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 15:17:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56088" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139903,imgsize-56088.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Phansi Ghar’ row: Atishi evicted from Delhi assembly; AAP seeks ASI survey</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi Assembly witnessed a tumultuous session as AAP MLAs, including Atishi, were marshalled out following a dispute with BJP members over the authenticity of a structure on the premises. The BJP claims the renovated site, inaugurated as a British-era execution chamber, was actually a tiffin room, accusing the AAP government of historical manipulation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/phansi-ghar-row-escalates-atishi-marshalled-out-of-delhi-assembly-aap-demands-asi-survey/articleshow/123141873.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/phansi-ghar-row-escalates-atishi-marshalled-out-of-delhi-assembly-aap-demands-asi-survey/articleshow/123141873.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:52:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1432014" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141981,imgsize-1432014.cms"/></item><item><title>Kerala house of horror: Over 10 burnt bones, skull, tooth found in man’s house</title><description><![CDATA[Police searched C M Sebastian's property in Alappuzha regarding Jainamma's disappearance. They found skeletal pieces, a bag, and cloth. A pond was drained, and a septic tank inspected. Ground-penetrating radar and a cadaver dog were used. Sebastian admitted knowing the missing women and having financial dealings. He hasn't revealed what happened to them. The investigation continues to find more evidence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kochi/women-missing-case-skeletal-remains-found-in-compound/articleshow/123102502.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kochi/women-missing-case-skeletal-remains-found-in-compound/articleshow/123102502.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:46:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2636942" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123138052,imgsize-2636942.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar SIR row: Kharge seeks discussion in RS; writes to Deputy Chairman</title><description><![CDATA[Mallikarjun Kharge has urged the Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman to allow a discussion on the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls in Bihar, emphasizing its critical importance to voters, especially those from weaker sections. Despite Mohammed Siraj's impressive performance, Bumrah remains a top performer. Tendulkar also lauded Washington Sundar's all-round contributions and defended India's decision to play on during the Manchester Test, supporting the team's spirit and dismissing concerns about England's bowlers needing rest before the final Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/just-a-coincidence-sachin-tendulkar-on-team-india-winning-without-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123141227.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/just-a-coincidence-sachin-tendulkar-on-team-india-winning-without-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123141227.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:23:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44126" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141406,imgsize-44126.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Karni Sena worker tries to slap Swami Maurya in Fatehpur; arrested</title><description><![CDATA[In Fatehpur, Swami Prasad Maurya faced an attack. Maurya has been in the news for controversial remarks on Hinduism. His comments have sparked outrage among Hindu groups.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-karni-sena-worker-tries-to-slap-swami-maurya-in-fatehpur-arrested/articleshow/123139069.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-karni-sena-worker-tries-to-slap-swami-maurya-in-fatehpur-arrested/articleshow/123139069.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:57:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139301,imgsize-63698.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[EU-sanctioned refiner Nayara takes Microsoft to court over outage]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/companies/eu-sanctioned-refiner-nayara-takes-microsoft-to-court-over-outage-19644823.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Nayara Energy has initiated legal action against Microsoft in Delhi High Court, alleging abrupt suspension of its licensed services including Outlook and Teams. The move follows EU sanctions against the Russia-linked Indian refiner. Nayara claims Microsoft acted unilaterally, restricting access to critical tools without notice, consultation, or recourse.]]></description>
